com.fergusleah.dla

Class DLALogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fergusleah.dla.DLALogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DLALogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    DLALogic is responsible for running the diffusion limited aggregation algorithm which causes the structure to grow. This class also holds the data structures and variables which are used to store and control the growing structure.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        The core DLA logic. Particles move randomly within the grid and attempt to attach themselves to the growing structure. Particles which move too far away from the growing structure to the outside kill zone are eliminated.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getDlaCircleDiameter

        public int getDlaCircleDiameter()
        Access the diameter of the full DLA circle.
        Returns:
        The DLA circle diameter.

      • getAttachedParticles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Square> getAttachedParticles()
        Access the list of particles which are attached to the growing structure.
        Returns:
        The list of attached particles.

      • resetAttachedParticles

        public void resetAttachedParticles()
        Create and assign a new empty list to hold the attached particles.

      • resetPositionContainsAttachedParticle

        public void resetPositionContainsAttachedParticle()
        Create and assign a new array of false boolean values, used to quickly check positions for attached particles.

      • getFirstColour

        public java.awt.Color getFirstColour()
        Access the first colour. This will be the colour of the first DLA particles.
        Returns:
        The initial colour of the growing structure.

      • setFirstColour

        public void setFirstColour(java.awt.Color firstColour)
        Set the first colour. This will be the colour of the first DLA particles.
        Parameters:
        firstColour - The new colour to become the initial colour of the growing structure.

      • getSecondColour

        public java.awt.Color getSecondColour()
        Access the second colour. This will be the colour of the final DLA particles.
        Returns:
        The final colour of the growing structure.

      • setSecondColour

        public void setSecondColour(java.awt.Color secondColour)
        Set the second colour. This will be the colour of the final DLA particles.
        Parameters:
        secondColour - The new colour to become the final colour of the growing structure.

      • getMaskSize

        public int getMaskSize()
        Access the size of the particle mask.
        Returns:
        The size of the mask used to attach particles to the growing structure.

      • setMaskSize

        public void setMaskSize(int maskSize)
        Set the size of the particle mask.
        Parameters:
        maskSize - The new size of the mask used to attach particles to the growing structure.

      • getFillPercentage

        public double getFillPercentage()
        Access the percentage of the DLA circle to be filled.
        Returns:
        The fill percentage set to 100% by default.

      • setFillPercentage

        public void setFillPercentage(double fillPercentage)
        Set the percentage of the DLA circle to be filled. Also recalculate the maximum number of particles in the DLA.
        Parameters:
        fillPercentage - The new fill percentage 0-100.

      • isDrawMaskEnabled

        public boolean isDrawMaskEnabled()
        Access the boolean value used determine whether mask draw is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        True is mask is enabled, else false.

      • setDrawMaskEnabled

        public void setDrawMaskEnabled(boolean drawMaskEnabled)
        Set the boolean value used determine whether mask draw is enabled or not.
        Parameters:
        drawMaskEnabled - New boolean value to enable or disable mask drawing.
